VE.note: Despite Venezuela is not using CIPS system, there are some key factors that let us think this situation could change in the next future. These reasons could be the following: 1) In 2018, presidents from the Venezuelan Central Bank and the People´s Bank of China signed a cooperation agreement, 2) In 2019, president Nicolás Maduro announced his intention to use new international payments systems to bypass the US financial sanctions against his government, 3) Recently, Venezuela announced the adoption of the Russian "MIR" payments system, and 4) Maduro´s government has the serious intention to promote politics that switch the use of the US dollars by other currencies like Russian rubbles or Chinese Renmimbi.
